Task.Alias: Create a schedule for the project
Task.Description: Develop a timeline that outlines key milestones, tasks, and deadlines for the entire project duration.

Task.Alias: Decide on a budget for the project
Task.Description: Establish financial constraints and allocations for resources, materials, and other project-related expenses.

Task.Alias: Assign resources to the project
Task.Description: Identify and allocate human, financial, and material resources needed for the successful execution of the project.

Task.Alias: Perform risk analysis and develop risk management strategies
Task.Description: Identify potential risks that may impact the project. Develop strategies to mitigate, monitor, and manage risks throughout the project lifecycle.

Task.Alias: Determine internal and public communication and protocols
Task.Description: Define communication channels and protocols for both internal team members and external stakeholders.

Task.Alias: Divide the project into small tasks
Task.Description: Break down the project into smaller, manageable tasks or activities to facilitate better planning and execution.

Task.Alias: Attach an engineer to each task
Task.Description: Assign qualified engineers or team members to specific tasks based on their skills and expertise.

Task.Alias: Follow the progress of the project against the schedule
Task.Description: Regularly monitor and assess the project's progress in comparison to the established schedule.

Task.Alias: Receiving data from the client
Task.Description: Collect relevant data and requirements from the client to inform the development process.

Task.Alias: Writing code in the data layer
Task.Description: Develop the code responsible for handling data storage and retrieval.

Task.Alias: Trying to run and test the code for the data layer
Task.Description: Execute and test the data layer code to identify and address any issues or bugs.

Task.Alias: Writing code in the logical layer
Task.Description: Develop the code responsible for implementing the business logic and processing.

Task.Alias: Trying to run and test the code for the logical layer
Task.Description: Execute and test the logical layer code to ensure proper functionality and identify any issues.

Task.Alias: Designed the interface
Task.Description: Create the user interface (UI) design based on project requirements and user experience principles.

Task.Alias: Attempt to run and test the code for the interface
Task.Description: Execute and test the interface code to ensure a seamless user experience and address any design-related issues.

Task.Alias: Attempt to run the code
Task.Description: Execute the entire codebase to identify and fix any integration issues or bugs.

Task.Alias: Sending the interface to the client and focus groups
Task.Description: Share the designed interface with the client and relevant focus groups for feedback and validation.

Task.Alias: Correction of recent errors
Task.Description: Address and rectify any errors or issues identified during testing or feedback sessions.

Task.Alias: Submission of the project
Task.Description: Present the completed and tested project to stakeholders for final approval and delivery.

Task.Alias: Define the purpose and scope of the project
Task.Description: Define the boundaries and limitations of the project, specifying what is included and excluded.
